title: PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION
content:
PETITION FOR CERTIFICATION
State Regulations
§ 263.19 - Petition; filing
§ 263.20 - Petition for certification filed by employee or their representative; contents
§ 263.21 - Sufficiency of petition
§ 263.22 - Showing of interest
§ 263.23 - Notification of petition to other parties
§ 263.24 - Statement of position and offer of proof in certification cases

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
